I‚Äôm hopeful that the Supreme Court of North Carolina will act in line with our state‚Äôs Constitution and overturn these partisan gerrymandered maps to ensure that the only people with the power to pick our representatives are North Carolina voters.

But instead, North Carolina Republicans abused the redistricting process and intentionally designed legislative and congressional maps that‚Äôll make it easier for them to win future elections ‚Äî disenfranchising millions of voters for their own political gain.

Our state‚Äôs population has grown and diversified over the past decade. The redistricting process in our state should have reflected this change, creating fair districts where communities are not split apart and one vote counted just the same as the next ‚Äî no matter the zip code.
A panel of North Carolina judges just allowed Republicans‚Äô partisan gerrymandered legislative maps to stand.

The James Webb Space Telescope, named after a North Carolinian & former NASA administrator, successfully unfolded its mirror - the largest one NASA has built. This is great progress that will help us collect more information with this historic telescope. + https://t.co/vEh1FpcZNr
I‚Äôll never stand down in the fight for our democracy, for the American people, and for our free and fair elections.  https://t.co/qlmpEzhV6g

One year later, it‚Äôs clear that we still have a lot of work to do to heal, rebuild, and prevent further attacks on our democracy ‚Äî including attacks on our fundamental right to vote. It won‚Äôt be easy, but I truly believe our democracy will prevail ‚Äî if we fight for it.

I‚Äôll forever be inspired that on the evening of January 6th, even in the face of an insurrection, Congress reconvened. We came together on the House floor to perform our sacred duty to the nation by certifying the election results.

Today, we mourn the brave Americans who died in defense of our democracy and express our heartfelt gratitude to the courageous Capitol Police officers who defended the Capitol on that terrible day and work tirelessly every day to keep us safe.

On this day in 2021, insurrectionists ‚Äî incited by hate and misinformation from the highest levels ‚Äî stormed the United States Capitol in an attempt to prevent a peaceful transfer of power. https://t.co/gV1eHaa3BZ

Wade would be a blatant attack on reproductive freedom and violate nearly 50 years of legal precedent.¬†If SCOTUS overturns Roe, many more states in the U.S., including North Carolina, could be emboldened to enact abortion bans, disproportionally hurting women. https://t.co/5WdkgV9ghe

Moving around often and being away from loved ones can be hard for military families. During National Veterans and #MilitaryFamilyMonth, we recognize the sacrifices these families make in service to our country. To all military and veteran families: thank you.
North Carolina voters should get to choose their elected representatives. Instead, this map is another case of our elected representatives choosing their voters.
North Carolinians deserve fair maps and a transparent redistricting process. They got neither.
This map does not represent the best interests of North Carolinians. Members of both parties could have worked together in good faith to develop a fair map that reflects the people of this state.

It is the product of an extreme partisan gerrymandering process that is being used to help Republicans win more easily with the ultimate goal of reclaiming control of the U.S. House of Representatives.
The map passed by the NC General Assembly was clearly drawn to favor Republican candidates while silencing the voices of thousands of North Carolina voters.

Free and fair elections are the cornerstone of our democracy and we can‚Äôt have fair elections without fair maps. North Carolina is an evenly divided state, and we should have a congressional delegation that reflects our citizens.

Have a blessed Diwali!

My other amendment expands the definition of PFAS to better align with the current science. This change will help keep our servicemembers and all Americans safe from toxic chemicals.
These amendments require reports on access to menstrual products and accommodations and on potential TRICARE coverage of preconception and prenatal genetic carrier screening tests.
I voted to pass #NDAA and am thrilled it includes 3 of my amendments. Two of these amendments aim to support military women and families. https://t.co/AsTOrXA3uT

It also provides our men and women in uniform with a 2.7 percent pay increase; makes critical changes to how the military addresses sexual assault; and expands TRICARE coverage‚Äîincluding by removing cost sharing for contraceptive coverage.
